WorkItem.Description:
Hi,

When calling pasteHTML, the debugger shows an error that    r.select();  
on line 124 is not a function (version 0.7.5 of jHtmlArea)
It still works, though ...

Also, in Safari or Chrome, pasteHTML surrounds the pasted html with a double set of   ... 
so the extra insertion of a span on line 121 seems not necessary.
WorkItem.Summary: r.select()  not a function on line 124 of version 0.7.5

Comments.Message: p.s.: I forgot to specify that this is using jquery 1.7.2
